      • getBundle

        public java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle()
        Description copied from interface: Localization
        Get the resource bundle for current locale. If the resource bundle is not found, an empty resource bundle is returned, to avoid MissingResourceException.
        Specified by:
        getBundle in interface Localization
        Returns:
        See Also:
